body.name: Hearth and Homestead: Handmade "Blue Outback" Australian Whipped Tallow Balm with Emu, Jojoba, Sandalwood, and Blue Cypress - 1.3 oz -

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Hearth and Homestead Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 13 hrs 49 mins
features: GRASS FED AUSTRALIAN TALLOW: This balm is made with specially sourced Australian tallow from mindfully raised, 100% grass fed Australian cows. Grass fed tallow is superior to grain fed in both quality and nutrient contents, to protect and restore your skin.

AUSTRALIA-SOURCED OILS: We used Australian emu oil--a deeply penetrating oil high in Vitamin K2, blue cypress oil, and sandalwood oil, which are ingredients utilized by the native tribes for thousands of years. We love the soothing, therapeutic qualities of these oils which are unique to the Australian continent.

VITAMIN POWERHOUSE: Tallow is rich in vitamins A,D,E,K and B1 as well as stearic and oleic fatty acids and saturated fat. This yields a balm that is nourishing to your skin, but also highly shelf stable! (Variations in texture are common, due to these unadulterated ingredients).

HERBY-FLORAL AROMA: with an aroma blend including blue cypress, sandalwood, clary sage, geranium, orange and lavender, Blue Outback provides an herbaceous, deep, slightly sweet and utterly relaxing aromatherapy experience.

ABOUT OUR PROCESS: At Hearth and Homestead, we are a small, family-owned business that holds to high standards for every single ingredient we put in our products. We use only high quality essential oils, butters, fats, herbs, and spices. We never use artificial ingredients like micas, dyes, or artificial fragrances.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game Changer for My Skincare Routine
reviews.reviewText: For years, I’ve been on a never-ending quest to find the perfect skincare product to address my combination skin and its myriad of issues—from dry patches to occasional breakouts. I’ve spent a small fortune on creams, oils, and serums that promised the moon but seldom delivered. That all changed when I stumbled upon this Beef Tallow Whipped Facial Cream. I was initially skeptical, considering beef tallow is more commonly associated with cooking rather than skincare. However, after researching its benefits and reading multiple glowing reviews, I decided to give it a shot.Texture and Consistency:Upon opening the jar, the first thing that struck me was its luxurious texture. The whipped consistency is light and fluffy, making it easy to apply and quick to absorb into the skin. Unlike many plant-based oils and creams, this beef tallow cream doesn't leave an oily residue but instead forms a protective barrier that makes the skin feel incredibly soft and supple.Ingredients:The product prides itself on being made from 100% grass-fed beef tallow, sourced from sustainable farms. Besides beef tallow, it also contains a blend of essential oils like lavender and chamomile, which not only adds a pleasant, subtle aroma but also has anti-inflammatory properties. The ingredient list is refreshingly minimal, devoid of any harmful chemicals, artificial fragrances, or preservatives, making it ideal for sensitive skin types.Efficacy:After just one week of daily application, I noticed a significant improvement in the overall texture and tone of my skin. The dry patches on my cheeks were nearly gone, and my T-zone was far less oily than before. I also had fewer breakouts, and the ones that did appear seemed to heal more quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just received my order today (quicker than expected, by the way) & put the tallow on my face/neck/hands. First, let me just say that the smell is divine (orange vanilla)! You don't need a large amount, & it melts into your face. My face feels so smooth & wonderful right now. I can't wait to see how my skin feels/looks in the morning. I have extremely dry skin, so I'm hoping this does the trick!! If it works as I'm hoping, I will definitely be reordering!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells like the dark Bordeaux See’s chocolates. Very rarely do I find a product that doesn’t have synthetic fragrances that actually smells good on my skin (lavender smells awful on me and I have a ton of allergies).A little goes a long way. It melts into the skin and moisturizes way better than anything else I’ve ever used. My skin dislikes lotions and creams, but does okay with oils. This is the best thing I’ve ever tried. I put it on my very dry hands and a little on my combination oily face and both skin has responded well. Really impressed. Overall skin has improved in the last week. Love knowing I’m not putting any chemicals on my body too.I just ordered some soaps and a couple of their other products to try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Trying to go more natural & clean after cancer diagnosis. There are so many chemicals and bad stuff in most "beauty" products nowadays. This tallow balm is amazing. A little goes a long way. It's not greasy. I got the orange vanilla, I want to eat it, it smells good...like a cremescicle. I will definitely buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Instant moisture difference
reviews.reviewText: As soon as you apply this product you can feel the moisture. My only concern is it does feel a bit greasy.This product works wonders on chapped lips as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and amazing product!
reviews.reviewText: First off.. the packaging is so cute. I’m so happy I found this balm!! Use this stuff once and you will never go back to nasty chemical filled skin care. This balm is moisturizing, smells amazing and it’s filled with the ingredients that’s you can even pronounce. I damaged my skin barrier trying DIY home skincare and this stuff helps build it back in no time. Obsessed with this company now. And it’s a small business that is a neighboring state so that is a plus!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing face cream!!!
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with this stuff. I was a little hesitant because other tallow products I’ve seen that were used on the face were super oily and didn’t really absorb and I’ve also read that the smell can be weird, not this product! I have combo skin, oily t zone but live in Colorado so super dry! I use this as my night cream because it does take a minute to absorb but it goes on so light, does not create excess oil, and there is no smell. This is now my new go to night time face cream. I’ve also used this on my daughters ezcema and she loves it, other stuff was burning her skin and also leaving her clothes oily since it would never absorb. Also a huge fan this is a family owned small business, all those giant companies put way too much crap in skin care products that just lead to health issue down the road. If you are looking for a tallow product this is it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product smells absolutely amazing!!!!! After first use, a lot goes a long way but it blends into your skin so nicely and doesn’t leave any greasy residue. If you’re interested in switching to a tallow lotion for your face, this is the one to try. Amazing product, amazing quality, highly recommend!!!!!
